name: Tilapia
description: Tilapia are freshwater fish known for their mild taste and adaptability. They are often found in warm, slow-moving waters.
behavior: Tilapia graze on algae and plant material and are commonly found near shallow, vegetated areas.
techniques: Still fishing with bait on bottom
whisper: Tilapia remind us that nourishment often comes through gentleness. Simplicity is sacred — honor it.
